eligibility of member to succeed himselfSection 43-45-5 - Election of officers; action by vote of four members; meetingsSection 43-45-6 - Reimbursement of commission membersSection 43-45-7 - Commissioner as secretary of commissionSection 43-45-8 - General powers and duties of commissionSection 43-45-9 - Examination for certification as an operator;
